context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

seek out help from community services or charity organizations that offer assistance for medical expenses
explore different means to afford the medication

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: check the security footage to see if he can identify when and how the money became missing
go back through his transactions and see if he made a mistake or missed something
inform his superior or the owner about the missing money and possibly investigate or review security footage, if it exists, to find out what happened to it
immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or the store owner
check the security footage if available to identify if any mistakes occurred or theft took place
immediately inform his superior or the owner of the bakery about the missing money
thoroughly check the register, all receipts, and bank statements to see if a mistake was made somewhere
double check all the transactions of the day
immediately report the missing money to his superior or the owner of the bakery
review the day's transactions or security footage to see if there was a mistake made or some theft occurred
